did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, financial records, reports, speeches, photographs, printed materials
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, financial records, reports, speeches, photographs, printed materials, certificates, and biography relating to Vandervort's work with the Tompkins County Public Library and the Finger Lakes Library System; the Tompkins County Senior Citizens' Council and senior citizens issues; the New York State College of Human Ecology; the New York State Fair; and women's rights issues. Also, letters from the Bull family (1922-26), interviews with Helen Vandervort by Eleanor Randles and Kathleen Babbitt.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, financial records, reports, speeches, photographs, printed materials, certificates, and biography relating to her work with the Tompkins County Public Library and the Finger Lakes Library System; the Tompkins County Senior Citizens' Council and senior citizens issues; the New York State College of Human Ecology; the New York State Fair; and women's rights issues. Also, letters from the Bull family (1922-26), interviews with Helen Vandervort by Eleanor Randles and Kathleen Babbitt.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Helen Vandervort papers, #4378. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
